**Announcement Title**
Temporary Help Services (THS) - Health Canada - Special Advisor (Senior)

**Tender Reference**
 CB-8902-36960335

**Amendment Information**
 Amendment Number: 2
 Amendment Date: September 15th, 2023

**Tender Details**
 Solicitation Number: 1000253736
 Publication Date: September 11th, 2023
 Tender Closing Date: September 15th, 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
 Expected Contract Start Date: September 25th, 2023
 Expected Contract End Date: August 25th, 2024

**Services Required**
Health Canada is seeking Temporary Help Services for the position of Special Advisor (Senior). This requirement is open to supply arrangement holders who have previously qualified for the Policy and Advisory Professional Services stream, category 13.9 (Special Advisor - Senior).

**Resources Required**
The total number of resources required for this contract is one (1).

**Security Level**
The minimum security level required for the resource is Reliability.

**Contract Period**
The proposed contract period is 48 weeks, from September 25th, 2023, to August 25th, 2024.

**Inquires and Submissions**
To obtain more information on this tender, please visit the Canada Buys website at [Canada Buys Website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

**Attachments**
The tender documents for this project can be found at [English Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8902/npp-english--temporary-help-services-requirement1000253736.pdf) and [French Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8902/sat-french---service-daide-temporaire-1000253736.pdf).

**Point of Contact**
For any inquiries regarding this tender, please contact Jason Genier at: jason.genier@hc-sc.gc.ca (613) 327-0596.
